title: CYBER_COWBOY
author: CYBER_COWBOY
created_time: April 21, 2023, 01:20:25 PMLast edit: April 24, 2023, 06:51:47 AM by CYBER_COWBOY
content: Hello.I want to start a casino affiliate website for Swedish customers.. (I think) but maybe international, i had a casino affiliate before, and its actually a very good business if you do the marketing the right way.But now when i am older and much busier i do not have the time to make a website, so I am looking for a friendly person that can create the website, you must have the aknowledge how a affiliate website should look.Example: https://www.sveacasino.se/Something like that but much more simple & basic.I only need help with making the website, everything else I will do myself. I wont pay any insane amounts, like 300$ is my limit, so if you think thats okay for you and you know how to do it, reply in this thread.A good looking wordpress website is enough if you very good at it.I also have long time in this business so I can see a scammer from miles distance, i wont send any money to somebody for nothing, so dont even try.If you are serious and honest you can contact me and I promise you will get a friendly and respectful deal without any problems.I dont need any help with marketing/SEO & can do a logo myself.I already have host provider, affiliate networks & i already got a domain.I will put all text and stuff on the website my selfI just need somebody to make the website, everything else I do my on my own.PROBLEM SOLVED, ALREADY GOT HELP.admin can lock this thread.

comments.author: SirJohnVonSlotty
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on April 21, 2023, 01:20:25 PMHello.I want to start a casino affiliate website for Swedish customers.. (I think) but maybe international, i had a casino affiliate before, and its actually a very good business if you do the marketing the right way.But now when i am older and much busier i do not have the time to make a website, so I am looking for a friendly person that can create the website, you must have the aknowledge how a affiliate website should look.Example: https://www.sveacasino.se/Something like that but a bit more simple.I wont pay any insane amounts, like 300$ is my limit, so if you think thats okay for you and you know how to do it, reply in this thread.I also have long time in this business so I can see a scammer from miles distance, i wont send any money to somebody for nothing, so dont even try.If you are serious and honest you can contact me and I promise you will get a friendly and respectful deal without any problems.Have a great weekend / CCI don't want to burst your bubble, but you've linked to one of the most popular and strongest casino affiliates on the Swedish market, and to mirror their success on the same market you would need a bit more zeros behind that amount. Sure you can build up a MVP, let me break it down for you:Design cost: I mean, a basic logo and some colors, probably you could find someone to build it for you for $50, but it's not gonna be nice. Domain cost: this is the most affordable one, I would go with a .com for better indexation. Hosting cost: a lot of hosting providers don't like gambling content, so you would need to find a gambling approved shared hosting provider, cca $50 per year for startersTemplate cost: let us say you're starting of with Wordpress, and then add a casino affiliate template on top like the Poka Theme, you're looking at around $60Content cost: You can try to go with AI content for starters, but you'd still need to learn how to fill out the template, test the operators and so on. In case you do go with human-written content, you're looking anywhere between $80 to $120 per review, depending on the writer. And I didn't even include marketing/SEO in the equation here.

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY

Easy..I am sure some people already have saved designs etc.So no problem, no bubble bursted.But thanks for your input.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Well, this sounds easy, but in reality, it is quite complicated and requires a lot of work.$300 is probably enough money for just setting up a site (WordPress with a paid theme and there are many reasons why it is a good solution), but there you have a problem with the content. If you want quality, it certainly cannot come at that price, and it is almost crucial for further successful promotion. As the gambling market is heavily loaded, any progress requires quite a lot of effort and investment, in the marketing of course.If we take into account that you are targeting the Swedish market, I assume that the plan is not to have everything in English but in Swedish. So for the content, you need someone with a good knowledge of the Swedish language. It can't be cheap for sure. When I mean cheap, I mean offers of $5-$10 per 500 words.Plus, regardless of the content, the site needs to be adapted to the local language, which reduces your choice of potential collaborators.Next, what can be a problem in your business, there are certain restrictions and prohibitions for users from Sweden when it comes to casinos with a Curacao license. It will bring you additional work, time invested in research etc... It doesn't matter if you want to do it all yourself or if you have to hire someone, there are certainly additional costs.Why am I telling you this? I am currently in the process of setting up two services of a very similar nature, so I go through the whole process. A similar idea with an affiliate gambling service was abandoned because of too much work, and the niche is very demanding and competitive.As I said, I am currently on very similar projects, although I'm still learning and if you need some advice, or help, you can contact me.

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY

I am Swedish and I will do all that myself.For the second time.. I just need somebody to make the website, everything else I do on my own.I have created and build many affiliate websites before with wordpress that made alot of money and them looked very good with very less effort. So I know its possible, i just dont have the time to do it myself right now.And I dissagree its to much work, when you start to get signups from your website everything runs automaticlly, i still making money from my old website but its shut down becasue the people signed up still playing.You get like 30%-40% of their losses from the day they signed up and until the day they stop playing.And I also wont get any problem because of a license, I running a affiliate website and not a casino, i dont need any license my self, I just sign up on a network and they fix everything and they take % from all my earnings.If you are good at marketing & SEO and know how to promote your website. its possible to make insane money and you dont need to have an advanced website.Trust me I know this and i am very good with marketing & SEO.But thanks for your opinion and good luck with your projects mate! If you need any help, you can contact me.

comments.author: SirJohnVonSlotty
comments.body: So basically you just need someone to install wordpress and install a casino affiliate theme, adjust it so that it meets your design tone that you already have, and no further edits are needed? If yes, I would recommend @misterrtwisterr or @talkativecoin, I went over their portfolios in my last competition and they both have the skillset for the above.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: If you have a casino affiliate site before then why you are not using those designs once again? Have you committed any type of mis deed for that you do not want to use that design or you have lost your file that's why you are unable to use your previous design??

comments.author: Saisher
comments.created_time: April 23, 2023, 10:19:33 PMLast edit: April 23, 2023, 11:25:28 PM by Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: SirJohnVonSlotty on April 21, 2023, 03:57:30 PMSo basically you just need someone to install wordpress and install a casino affiliate theme, adjust it so that it meets your design tone that you already have, and no further edits are needed? If yes, I would recommend @misterrtwisterr or @talkativecoin, I went over their portfolios in my last competition and they both have the skillset for the above. OP needs no help in installing a WordPress site he should be the one doing the launch because it allows giving access to his Cpanel, to launch the script. OP just needs to launch the WordPress script I'm sure the domain is already connected to the hostname server so it's already propagated.OP knows what I'm talking about because he claimed to own WordPress sites, I wonder why he needs to pay $300 for launching a WordPress site all the themes he needs when it comes to affiliates are on the WordPress theme page and when it comes to SEO all OP has to do is to set the permalink to /%postname%/ and he is good to go.If he still wants to hire he just needs to launch the WordPress script and give him the admin username and password.
